title: Yakusoku no Kuni
sinopse: The Confederation of Socialist Republics Hiltria. With the slogan "together in a brotherly love" 5 republics and 5 ethnicities manage to coexist with difficulty. Coming from the future, David Ernst will rise in fame with his comrades as a Hero of the Confederation. Searching for the right answer between Self determinism and Socialism, to lead his country toward the right future.
